name: 李昊
bio_zh:
我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的四年级（2022年-至今）博士研究生，师从张鼎文教授。

自2025年4月起，我在新加坡南洋理工大学进行访问，师从刘子纬教授。我目前还在美团龙猫基础模型团队担任进行项目合作（北斗计划）。

我的研究兴趣包括多模态大模型、3D视觉和3D AIGC。
bio_en:
I am currently a fourth-year Ph.D. student (2022–present) in the School of Automation at Northwestern Polytechnical University, advised by Prof. Dingwen Zhang.
Since April 2025, I have been a visiting Ph.D. student at Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore, working with Prof. Ziwei Liu. I am also collaborating with the Meituan Longmao Foundation Model Team (Beidou Talent Program) on related research projects.
My research interests include multimodal large models, 3D computer vision, and 3D AIGC.
